dct_title_s: A new map of Hindoostan : from the latest authorities
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details:Scale [1:7,000,000]. Inset map:"Isle of Ceylon." Shows boundaries, rivers, roads and settlements. Relief shown pictorially and with shading. Greenwich meridian. Dimensions: 46 x 52 centimeters
